subject: [PLEASE HELP ME] [Rewrite] My SIMSONN PRO pedal isn't working.
description_text:
I wrote the ticket last time, but surppor@simsonn.com isnt now working, so
I'm rewriting it. I'll explain the order number, model name, and the shape
of the control box you will ask first.

First of all, my pedal is SIMSONN PRO model, and I bought a model that says
SPRO 2P 2H from AliExpress. The software recognized my pedal as SIMSONN
1.7.1.

The order number I ordered from SIMSONN's official AliExpress website is
1105747314449841. Currently, the product page has disappeared, but I
purchased it on June 17, 2024.

My control box is a control box with an open side to which the ground wire
is attached, so you can see the substrate. The grounding is well done.

The issue is as follows.
I first used SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 version on the SIMSONN homepage, but
when I connected, it showed an old version. I was told to install manually,
so I did it with the correct procedure, but the installation did not
proceed properly. The progress bar did not move and the software showed a
message that the installation was complete, but I did not recognize it
properly. Sometimes I recognized it with the device name SIMSONN 1.7.1, but
I couldn't recognize the axis and when the pedal was connected at any time,
the program's rack was severe, so the screen was cut off every two seconds.
When I unplugged the pedal line, it got better. After that, I installed and
ran SimPedalsConfig_V4, but strangely, when the pedal was connected, the
program failed. I recognized that the device was connected, but I couldn't
find the axis moving. I finally used Freejoy because I couldn't use both
programs. However, in the process, I accidentally pressed Write and the
program was covered and burned. This machine failed.

I want a solution to this problem. I'm a boarding student, so I can only
play games on weekends, and it's sad that this happens :(

First of all, I'd like you to give me a way to install proper firmware in
my control box and a config file to rewrite as Freejoy that fits my pedal
model. Manual installation in SIMSONN Manager did not work well.

I really want to solve this problem and use Padal. Please reply. Have a
nice day

 The order number I ordered from SIMSONN's official AliExpress website is 1105747314449841. Currently, the product page has disappeared, but I purchased it on June 17, 2024.

 I want a solution to this problem. I'm a boarding student, so I can only play games on weekends, and it's sad that this happens :(
